/* Input parameters for program EWDC (Production System 4).
   The file is only needed if the economic value for claw disease incidence
   is to be calculated. It file contains input parameters for the calculation
   of cost due to claw diseases in the cow herd.
   Be careful when changing input parameters. Please notice that 
     the description of the given parameter or vector is posted under 
     the number(s).
   MU: monetary unit */
10.8
"Average cost for drugs per claw disease case treated with antibiotics"
"MU/case"
0.5
"Average veterinarian's time spent per antibiotic treatment of claw disease"
"hours/case"
12
"Average charge for veterinary service"
"MU/hour"
5.8
"Cost for drugs per claw disease case not treated with antibiotics"
"MU/case"
1.5
"Average herdman's (or trimmer) time dealing with an average claw disease case 
(both antibiotic treatment and treatment without antibiotics)"
"hours"
5.6
"Value of herdman's (or trimmer) time"
"MU/hour"
0.70  1.20 1.01  1.01  1.08  1.10  1.12  1.12  1.12  1.12
"Vector of the total incidence rate of claw diseases per cow-year at risk in lactation 1 to LL (in the whole calving interval)"
"Number of claw disease cases per cow-year at risk"
0.20  0.25 0.30  0.30  0.30  0.30  0.30  0.30  0.30  0.30
"Number of claw diseases treated with antibiotics (veterinarian treatments)
as proportion of all claw diseases per cow-year at risk in lactation 1 to LL
